TextView.android:text: लक्ष्मी - मम नाम लक्ष्म। भवत: नाम किम् ?
राज - मम नाम राज। कथमस्ति भवती ?
Laxmi - My name is Laxmi. What is your name ?
Raj - My name is Raj. How are you ?
Laxmi - Im fine. How are you ?
(While referring to a female we use the word भवत्या:)
(While referring to a male we use the word भवत:)
छात्रः : आम्, मम गृहपाठ समाप्त: अस्ती।
Teacher - Did you finish your homework ?
Student - Yes, my homework is completed.
(While referring to a male in third person, we use the word तस्य)
(While referring to a female in third person, we use the word तस्या:)
Shyam - I'm going to my native village.
Kunal - What is your village name ?
Shyam - My village name is Satara.
हर्ष - अह कुशली। भवतः विषये किम् ?
हर्ष - मम ग्रामः मुंबई. भवतः ग्रामः ?
शशांक - मम ग्रामः पुणे.भवान् कस्यां कक्श्यायां पठति ?
हर्ष - अहं दशमःकक्श्यायां पठामि । भवान् कस्यां कक्श्यायां पठति ?
Harsh : Im fine. what about you ?
Shashsnk - Im good, where are you from ?
Harsh : Im from mumbai. Where are you from ?
Shashank - Im from pune. Which class are you in ?
Harsh : I am in standard X. Which class are you in ?
Shashank - I am in standard XI.
राघव - राजेश भवत: मम पुस्तकम् दृष्टवती वा ?
राजेश - आम् । पुस्तकम् उत्पी उत्पीठिका उपरि एव अस्ती।
Raghav - Rajesh, Have you seen my book ?
Rajesh - Yes. Book is on the table.
